mapper.select: select decode(rel_full_addr_cuid,null,id, (select object_id from t_rofh_full_address fa where fa.cuid = rel_full_addr_cuid)) id, name, nm_get_py(name) spell, full_name, nm_get_py(full_name) full_spell from t_rofh_addr_rel where rel_id = #{id}

select FA.LABEL_CN name, FA.object_id, upper(fa.pinyin) pinyin, FA.room_no, t.oldcuid districtid, t.label_cn districtname from t_rofh_full_address fa left join district t on fa.county = t.cuid where fa.object_id = #{id}
select full_name from t_rofh_addr_rel where id = #{id}

select count(1) TOTALCOUNT from t_rofh_full_address FA left join district t on t.cuid = fa.county where 1=1
and replace(fa.label_cn,'|','') like '${detailName}'
and replace(upper(fa.pinyin),'|','') like '%${detailSpell}%'
and t.oldcuid = #{districtId}
select id from t_rofh_addr_rel r where r.rel_full_addr_cuid = (select cuid from t_rofh_full_address where object_id = #{id})
select wm_concat(id) parentids from (select id from t_rofh_addr_rel start with id = #{id} connect by prior rel_id = id order by rownum desc)
select d.cuid, d.district_code code from district d where d.data_type = '3' and cuid like 'DISTRICT-00001-00010%'

select cuid from (select cuid from district d where d.oldcuid = #{id} and d.data_type = 4 union select t.related_district_id from t_pboss_district t where t.id = #{id}) t where t.cuid like '${city}-%' and rownum = 1
